Siam paragon. In my to do list of Bangkok and is a really good mall with a underwater world on top it's wonderful.
Okay... My family and I went to Siam Paragon. Its huge! I got lost finding Kidzania.I had to ask some security guards for directions. There is also the Siam Ocean World. It is good for children.

Well worth a visit. Huge shopping Centre offering anything from a Cinema, sealife centre and a Madame Tussauds to nearly every clothes shop that you can think of and on the bottom floor is a huge Thai food court including many individual restaurants serving cuisine from all over the world.
Connects directly from Siam BTS train station.

Its OK if you like Malls. Its a safe place to cool down.. Like most other Malls world wide. Pretty big next to a load of other malls. Nice food court which you pay for. All the standard fast food and a few specialist restaurants like Bimimbap for some Korean food. Shopping is OK but there are better and chepaer places. The IMAX and cinema is OK with latest releases in English. Cheaper to watch it here than at home. We seem to end up back here quite a lot and use this as a base for our day.

Best time during the hottest time of the day. This is a luxury mall with all the major fashion brands. You can see a couple of Lamborghini, Roll Royce, and other high end cars. We had lunch there and then we went to the IMAX theater to see the latest 007 movie. Great way to stay cool during the hottest part of the day. Recommended.

A great mall to check out, mostly branded shops. This mall is itself something worth checking out, beautiful outside and inside. If ur looking to buy brand items, this is one of the hotsopts. This place also has the Siam Ocean World ans Madamme Tussads, both worth checking out.

Fancy but still friendly. I rarely visit malls when I go to Bangkok (the markets are more fun for me) but if you need something fancy or you just want to see what the fuss over BKK malls is all about, this is the place to go. Check out the Kinokuniya for a good range of books or the department store for some cute, kitschy stuff you didn't think you'd need. The food court at the basement floor is also a must-visit! You have to pay up for a prepaid card in order to purchase a meal from one of their food court stalls. Best that you decide which items you will be ordering and take note of how much these will be when buying your prepaid card.

Worth a trip. Very good. Usual brands with some extras thrown in. Food court amazing with something from all parts of world. We did the aquarium. Worth a trip if get to hot. Shark and penguin feeding good.

The "WOH" shopping mall for now!. Everything under one roof title must go to Siam Paragon for now! Prices is not their selling point here in fact all branded stuff are expensive as in other mall... for tourist few things to go for..1) The emporium store, with the same price as all stores they carry the biggest collection of every brands.. just try their ladies bra section for an sample, so just wait for their so call sales, some of the "Branded"" local made stuff is really cheap.. a tip NEVER buy any imported stuffs, every thing made locally is ok. 2) B1, where all good foods lies in wait, they have all kind of everything.. my favorite the Fuji Jap restaurant and the Kreme K donut for coffee (beware their donuts is dame sweet). 3) The supermarket has everything too.. one of a kind must take a tour. 4) The big open space and comfort is secord to none ,H&M store, or just window shop and last but not least it's next to Siam BTS.... Use to stay in Novotel Siam Sq... Shop, eat, look-see and massage all my stress away... My favorite spot in BKK...

Amazing. Huge shopping centre right next to Siam BTS, amazing shopping experience, hundreds of stores, lots of stuff/events happening outside and around the area. Breathtaking size, if you shop go here.

One of the best in BK. Been her a lot and it is a very nice mall with all the high end ships. ..nice place to spend the day...very good food places and also a nice cinema...clean and safe and one of the best I BKK
Amazing Siam. This was a breathtaking experience. A must go for every tourist. It's extremely colorful and vivacious. ...Takes you into a different world
Heaving and busy. Nonstop crowds on every floor. Ground for food galore and 4th or 5th for luxury cars. Where else can you shop for food and a car to take it home?

Heaven for serious shoppers. This is an upmarket mall close to sukhumvit & platinum fashion mall. It houses all big brands.. LV, Bang & Olufsen, vertu, Bally, Hugo Boss et all.. Only for serious shoppers.. Don't go for window shopping else you will constantly feel sad for not being able to buy it.. :-P

Branded versions. Located near Siam BTS. The outside has a beautiful waterfall and some palm trees. Nice elevators. Very good toilets. This shopping mall has a lot of restaurants of different variety of food at the ground floor. There are other expensive restaurants upstairs too. The mall is full of branded products. I think it's mainly for the branded lovers. There's an electronic mall where I got some portable hard drive and also a big kinokuniya bookshop. I spend like 5 hours looking for some books of my interest. I even went to customers service for VAT refund. It can be claimed if you buy over 2000 baht.

The Rich shopping, a bit cheaper.. This is the 'rich' and only-original version of MBK. 6 (?) extensive floors of all the big brands in every section (fashion, cars, technology...). It includes the best range of cinemas on the top floor (IMAX and VIP Blue Ribbon experience) with many English-spoken premieres, and also the best variety of foods from all over the world (ground floor), including an amazing Gourmet Market. p.s. Fantastic English-written Bookshop in Level 3 (?) with an amazing variety.

Level 5 exhibition area. As of my company customer held a full day event on the level 5 of Siam paragon shopping mall, i have then the privilege to know this can be done and it is on the same level as the cinema. The area is very big and the meeting hall can accommodate at least 1200 seating (theatre style) for business conference. However, holding the event earlier than the official shopping mall opening at 10 am is an issue. The delegates and sponsors representatives had to figure out the right back entrance ( along the car park and further from staff entrance ) to go direct to the conference and exhibition area. The best advantage: it is a good location as it is nearest to siam station by BTS.

One of my favorite in Bangkok. The siam paragon is situated on sukhumvit road close to BTS siam station. The mall is beautiful and has all types of brands ranging from budget to high end. Very well organized and maintained mall. A must if you like to shop.
for serious shoppers and others to people watch. this place is amazing, modern exclusive and I think every designer option available, great places to eat and wonderful shoppers heaven

just another upmarket mall...you could be anywhere in the world.... If you want local colour, avoid these upmarket malls. Once inside you have the same international brands you can find anywhere in the world...not too much local flavour or colour ( like you will find at Terminal 21)...OK though if you want to shop the international luxury brands
Gourmet market. A variety of goods. Some products bought at another store but there's this. Fresh fruit imported from abroad

Many activities for everyone for a mall. Impressive and beautiful mall for everyone. First the place is stunning. Second the mall is on the high end side of shopping. Third the cinema is awesome with a 4dsx theater. Fourth there is a sea world which I highly recommend as there are a lot of shows and experience that you can go for such as diving with the shark and so on. 5th many variety of food. Overall one of the best place to spend time an also shop.

Best shopping. I like it here because it is a large department store. And there are many products The elegant decorations And many activities. Easy access to other attractions, including the adjacent train station.

Nothing but the Best. Siam Paragon is definitely one of the best places to shop ever.Conveniently located metres away from Siam Central BTS station. It housed all the high end brand names and much more. There is even a floor which showcase the high end cars like Rolls Royce, Aston Martin, Lamborghini and BMW. Definitely one of the highlights for my husband. We love the Gourmet Market where we did our groceries. The variety is mind boggling literally a foodie paradise.Another common observation (in almost every Bangkok mall we have been so far) is that there is always an abundance of seating places for the weary feet. And the seats are always so comfy.

Luxury shopping mall. Siam paragon was located at the center of Bangkok. You can find many luxury brand in there. This is the place that you will get the other experience in Bangkok. Moreover, if Siam Paragon isn't your type, you can go to MBK center which wasn't far from here.

Great Shopping and Food. The choices are endless for shopping and the bottom floor houses a fantastic market and food court, including many restaurants and fast food chains. Make time to take it all in, the layout is large. Movie theaters and many things to see.
Prices went up dramaticly. Was three years ago and noe and the prices quiet high.Didn't find any special deals.Anyway this mall is very famous and part of any shoping tour in Bangkok.
Nice Luxury Mall. Nice Luxury Mall in the middle of Bangkok. You can stay at this mall whole day. A lot of activities to do here. Many Hi-Brand and a lot of option of shop, food and famous dessert.

Huge malls with a lot of branded store. Siam paragon is one of (if not the most) the luxurious and gigantic malls in bangkok. They have a big Naraya store there, Sephora, and you can find many luxury branded store. I heard that there's a huge kids area so kids can play while u shop!

One of the best malls!. This is by far the best mall I have ever been to. Great location, easy access from the BTS. This is a shoppers haven, from European to Asian brands. It also has a lot of restaurants to also chose from.
Another Superb mall. A huge mall situated in the heart of Bangkok.Has all the high end stores as well as a multiplex and several restaurants.

shoppingggg!. One of the excellent malls in Bangkok. Very elegant shops, high prices not for everyone pocket. Do not miss the food court in the first floor it is great! you can fund also good and authentic restaurants in the forth floor.
Best shopping. Great location which is near by BTS station. There are many restaurants in Siam Paragon beside the shipping mall has many choices.

Nice shopping complex. It has everything in there. Theater, foods, branded goods etc. So you can spend whole day if you like shopping. Best to go via BTS train since traffic jam around the area can be quite bad.

You'll be spoilt for choices. OH MY GOD. This is shopping heaven. Nirvana achieved.
The place is massive beyond comparison. Lots of fashion, tech, and car brands. But most importantly, it has Kinokuniya. Everything else is insignificant.
But yeah, if you want to shop in Bangkok, this is the place to be.

Peak of finnesse. Its a treat for ur eyes and senses. Beautiful ambience and scores of globally acclaimed brands and u may also discover interesting ppl here. The dancing fountains will cath ur eye and grab u for some time for sure. 4 stars for lack of affordability.another big plus is its access from bts siam station

Great environment with a lot of choices.. It is just next to bts siam station. Great air conditioning inside.Big food court and a lot of choices of restaurants.A big supermarket in the basement. The price is good and some of the products are even cheaper than big c.If you are interested, you can visit the big aquarium there. The design of the aquarium is the same as the one in Sydney. You can spend a day there.Enjoy!!!

Restaurant, Shopping, Bangkok Ocean world. - A lot of restaurants in Paragon, Famous restaurant like Four season, Laduree, and also local restaurant and etc..- Brand name shops - Theater - Super car- ect...
To die for. Everything you can think of and more. Food area is to die for. Movies up stairs are fabulous and open late. Always a great place to find reasonable priced real products

Paragon is becoming more and more high end shops, while the food goes downhill fast.. If you are very rich, then you will enjoy Paragon shopping center. Most of the stores are name brands with outrageous price tags. There are a few normal shops left, look in the back of the center. The department store in the center of the complex offers a wide range of products. Recently they went though a change where many of the better restaurants were asked to leave. Now the selection of food has gone down, while the prices have gone up. There are lots of dessert places though.

A fantastic 'designer' Mall. I visited at the weekend, it was somewhat packed by people 'window shopping' or just taking advantage of the air conditioning. The Mall is great, it has all the major brands in the world, the shops create great window displays, and of course that offer the usual VAT certificate for visitors. In the past l have visited mid week and learnt to visit early as when schools finish the Mall is mobbed by schoolchildren, it is worth a visit but do not expect to find items cheaper here, in fact some of the items are more expensive that mainland Europe, so 'do your homework before buying"
shopping mall. Great to go shopping with your friends orr alone, a lot of fun activities to do. There are always teenager shows setted here.

Go there for their Gourmet Market. The choices for food in this place will blow your mind. From fine dining to cafes to fast food - this place had it all. Siam was close to our hotel and we came here several times for lunch, evening coffee and even after dinner dessert.

Huge mall with Huge crowd. One of the biggest malls. Over crowded with people in ground floors. On top is somewhat better. Shopping heaven for shopaholics. Easily accessible by train, its in Siam station. Good theaters. Could kill few hours here.
Giant supermarket. It's a very clean and tidy place to have shopping. I love it's food court and market so much. Variety of food is not expensive there and you can eat at a comfortable place
Thailand pride. its amazing...I love and go many times when I am at Bkk..its uniq and feel more new my evey visit...I love it....bankok is nothing if siam is there....love u siam

HUGE!. This has to be one of the largest malls I have ever visited!
Fantastic selection of shops to suit all budgets.
Huge food court with so much choice.
This is also home to the Bangkok Sealife Centre located on the ground floor (clearly signed)
Siam Paragon is easily accessed by using the BTS Skytrain.
Nice place but unfriendly staff. I got turned off when a staff refused to sell us anything and she won't even allow us to touch the clothes!!!

Just a huge mall with everything. This shopping mall is one of three or four next BTS Siam (the Skytrain).
The food hall is in the basement and offers a great variety of good food.
The rest of the mall is just filled with every brand you can think of, including luxury car dealerships!
We worth a visit.

One of the top malls in Bangkok. Visited Siam Paragon to beat the heat and do some shopping. It's a very large complex with everything from H & M and Gap, to Prada and Dior. Coolest feature of the mall - it has Ferrari, Bentley, Mercedes showrooms on the 3rd level which were cool to see.
A wannabe world class mall.... ...where the luxury shops (wrist watches, jewelry) are closing down at 7 pm. Luckily H&M and Co. are open until 9 pm, LOL

High End Mall. Siam Paragon is the epitome of the malls in Bangkok for people with money. All the high end labels are there. Suffice it to say i spent very little time there. Easy to get to via the BTS Siam station.
Shopping spot. Siam Paragon is a luxurious shopping spot or even for window shopping. Maximum high-end brands have their stores in this mall with the latest fashion.
Very chic. Only the high end shops and interesting stores in Siam Paragon. Not to mention the Food Court with a variety of food choices. A must visit shopping place in Bangkok.

It's a mall. It's an upscale mall, just like in any modern city. Not for the price sensitive. The food court is decent. One advantage is that the ocean world is right inside this mall. You essentially get to see 2 landmarks of Bangkok.

Classy , Expensive.. It has branded outlets, expensive stuff. Didn't spend much time since I was made aware lot of cheap and good quality stuff is available elsewhere. But the Mall is good for Window shopping.

Sea Life! Worth visiting at Siam Paragon! . On the lower floor, Sea Life is an attraction one must see! The aquarium is supposed to be the biggest in South East Asia and they do have a of variety! The collection ranges from fishes to penguins and poisonous frogs from the jungles!The tickets for entry is prized at 990 THB...they also have Madame Tussauds wax museum and a 4D theatre bundle entry tickets too! Siam Paragon mall is good but its just like any other mall you would find anywhere else!

Expensive shopping. This place is definitely for the high end people. I'm from singapore & the price there for LV handbags are much more expensive. But maybe just a nice place to walk around and wander.

big department store @ BKK. Siam paragon is located at Siam station. It's a modern shopping complex. The top floor Paragon Hall hosts expos and a Cineplex shows the movies. Siam ocean world is in the basement (good for kid). The mall is open 10 a.m. to 10 p.m.

1st world prices. I can't think of a designer name that isn't here. You could spend an entire day shopping eating and going to the cinema afterwards upstairs. There is the food court downstairs at reasonable prices but this is about consumerism and if you want it, you can find it here. Another example of why shopping malls work better here than in the UK.

Luxury Touristy Pricy. You have to see it when in Bangkok, all the famous Brands in there and a great foodhall. but expect it to be always packed. also try out siam square and siam center for the more local designers.
Nice Shopping Complex. We had a quick scan through and it had a good selection of labels and departments.I liked the alternative fashion stores over the way that featured a range of local designers.
Best Shopping Center in Bangkok. Siam Paragon is where you can find all the international brands in Bangkok cities with wonderful experiences of all fine dine restaurants and best shopping center

Great "district" to spend a week. Siam Paragon is connected to Siam Center and Discovery Center (n a [temporarily closed] skybridge connects to MBK, MahBoonKrong mall, the grand-daddy of Bangkok malls). On the other side of the Siam BTS station is teen-trendy Siam Square n another new mall.One could spend a whole week in this area. But Paragon alone is so huge, most visitors don't get to appreciate all food & shopping options. Beyond the endless boutiques, go up to the 3rd floor to oggle at the Rolls-Royce showroom, or spend half a day at the fantastic aquarium in the basement. Don't miss the feeding times at the main tank. Very therapeutic, watching the fishes. Food, glorious food. Paragon supermarket is amazing, with a wide selection of imported foods, cooked food, n fresh fruits.For dining options, Fuji serves fresh, good Japanese food at super prices. MK Gold serves very good Chinese food and dim sum. Ka-Nom counter near the supermarket has the best Macau egg tarts, outside of Macau (pricey at baht 45, but well worth it). A-Not-Her Hound cafe (part of Greyhound group) on the first floor serves excellent Thai-Western "fusion" cafe fare (try the wings). See and be seen.The best Japanese buffet IN THE WORLD is at Paragon's Oishi Grand (reservations a must), pricey (almost baht 2,000) but worth every penny. Freshest quality, widest selection of Japanese food. Where else can U find (super expensive) "snow fish" at a buffet, cooked to your preference?Leave some space for the matcha (green tea) ice cream.

Must go when you are in Bangkok for shopping. This mall resembles me Dubai mall in richness. Easily you can spend about 2 to 3 hours with window shopping. All expensive brands available. Also there are luxury car display -----Lamborgene, Maserati. Nice to watch for kids.
Excellent International Gourmet Center!!. Siam paragon has all the best designer outlets in the world. The gourmet center is just amazing!! Great place for food lovers.
Luxury goods available here. All the luxury goods are available in this mall. There is even a food court on the first level. The basement of the mall housed the Madam Tussauds wax museum.
Interesting. Great brands and I was a bit surprised Massimo Dutti sells winter collections, so definitely internationaly oriented! Bring lots of money as this is the more expensive mall.

Designer Mall like anywhere in the world.. Difficult to know what to say about this place. On the one hand it is a huge designer mall with every brand you can think of. On the other hand there is nothing 'Thai' about it.Food court massive - we enjoyed this.
Something to do on a rainy day. Very nice shops, great food court...wasn't in shopping mode but ended up buying some stuff...it's difficult not to! :) Then the sun came out and I was gone!
Oh boy what a shopping mall. You have money, you are hungry and you want to shop?This is the place for youThe food court at this place is huge.Beware on your calories!
Shopping malls if shopping malls. If you want to go shopping for designer clothes. Pop here to experience shopping. Must experience food court. Another level!!

Love it . Ideal for shopping - it has all my favorite brands.
The food court is also amazing and offers a wide range of foods from local cuisine to all the popular fast food outlets as well.
Also well connected

love! . best food court food! had it 2x in 4 days. very convenient to get to, and lots of food choices. seating isn't great though, and at some point, had to find stand in front of someone elses table to wait.
how to ruin a concept. too many designer stores with pop ups out the front. so high end devalued by low end and everyone playing different music

Best Shopping Mall in Bangkok. This is the best shopping paradise in Bangkok. Great shops and department stores. All you can buy from here. The food court is the biggest and food there just amazing. All transport are able to access to this mall. Great shopper got tax rebate. A mall must go in Bangkok.
My favorite shopping. Siam Paragon is my favorite shopping mall. I like to meet friends there and shopping but only with my boyfriend because it is expensive.

museum of expensive brands ..look but don't touch. Worth looking through the Siam Paragon mall and the Paragon Department ,like a museum of beautiful and luxurious merchandise.There are a few middle range stores like Zara,Mango,HM,worth browsing through especially sale times .My favorite is the basement where you can find International Gourmet market (do some tasting ),huge supermarket,bakery,ice cream parlors, varies vegetables and fruit,and heeps of eating places ,cafes and much more.Sea life Ocean World is there as well.Top level Cinemas at affordable prices.huge book store on 2nd level and there is also a Wax Museum.Siam Sky Train,walk from MBK, or just walk from your nearby hotel.When have done all that then there the shopping centre across and to the side ,which are much cheaper and some are from local designers .In all worth making the effort if you have the time .
Fairly decent.. Pretty much similar to the shopping malls in America but overall very nice and definitely for those who want to spend more money compared to the street markets.

Shopping heaven. Last reviewed this in 2012 and like most of Bangkok it has evolved tremendously. Shopping over so many levels with a great food hall in the lower ground floor.Connected to the newly refurbished Siam shopping complex and walking distance to Central shopping Mall and the famous budget mall MBKNow across the road the night market has gone and new shopping experiences have opened alongside restaurants and bars.A really nice area to stroll around in the evenings when it is cooler, just for window shopping or eating from the vast choice of eateries.Once again the sky train is a good way to get there though a lot busier than 2012We actually brought a one day travel card 140 baht as used it the whole of the day says queuing for ages and looking for change,

Top end mall . Yes it may be a high end shopping mall but still a great experience walking around seeing the shops the people the cars hehe. if Siam Paragon is to rich for you, your only feet away from central world the Siam centre and even big C so everyone should be happy from the low end budget to the filthy rich there's something for everyone and a must for any first time traveler to bangkok and don't forget sea world below that alone is worth the visit as is the cinema

another great centre. Another amazing retail complex ousing with top end stores selling anything from a high end luxury vehicle to a inexpensive quality hawker market meal. Could easy spend the whole day here as it takes retail to a very relaxed level.
Stunning mall!. Nice mall in the Hart of Bangkok! Nice shops with a touch of class! Lots too do and to see! The food court is amazing.

Not worth a visit. We only went in as we were staying at the Sheraton next door. There is hardly any shops in there that are open, alot of building work going on and alot of the shops and bars listed on Trip Advisor as being there have closed.

Bangkok city center point. One of all time favorite, you can eat, shop, see, walk and other kind of family activities here. Have your eyes on their social media post, then you may grab some occasion of up to 80% off luxury brands. I got it my own one time.

Buying a McLaren while your spouse is doing the shopping…. This mall was huge, I mean it was and still it is a giant. You can purchase luxury products, brand names of course.
Moreover, you can buy luxury cars on the top floor. BMW was the cheapest…

Good food as always and never fail to amaze. The place is great and refreshing as always for me and friends, as good dining and supermarket at the basement level. A plethora vareity of foods and drinks available here. The location is just central at Siam BTS and within walking distance. I always come back for more during my trips.

western mall with western prices. Your in Thailand. Why do you want to go to western malls? If you must go, its pretty decent. It's attached to siam center. One of them has high end stores the other has mid range. One stop shop for western mall experience.

An upscale mall for the upscale tourist, or those that want to be.. This is a very large, very expensive mall. It has all the big name stores, with all the big name prices. It was great to visit and watch people, but not for my budget. If you need the Designer Clothes and accessories this is it. Compares it large malls I have seen in New York and Houston. The restaurants are nice also.

Best place to chill out in BKK. The nice place to chill out on any time in the middle of town in Siam. In my opinion the things here sales very expensive to due there are only high end brand name shop. But the super market at the basement was awesome and fair price. You can find any food all ard the world there. And the cinema on top floor is also awesome and fair price due to the quality and service. Also have Aquarium at underground.

excellent moll,with many things to make fun and entertament.. sea the rich food market,floor doun is good aqwarium with boats to seil,and wander..on top high level great cinema al day long.the corridors are full with "rivers"..very easy to reach ,"Saim sky train.

Great Shopping Complex. You can enjoy world class shopping mall.There are many Brand name , restaurants , theatre and hotel.Many Tourist must visit here and love it coz it located in the city and easy to travellilng to other place.Don't mis. recommented
Shopping . Have many brandname here give choose buy.have many restaurant and have cinema if want watch movies.can come by bts siam.

Best shopping mall in Bangkok.. Siam Paragon is a shopping mall as well as the Paragon department store in Bangkok.
Luxury brands as well as general merchandise can be found there in an airy and well organized mall.
Just another mall. Just another mall with typical stores and overpriced foods at the food court. It's near the Siam BTS station, and there's a direct access from it to the mall.

A high end shopping centre. This high end shopping centre is conveniently located next to the Siam BTS station. This shopping centre centre is celebrating its 10 years anniversary. Being a high end department it has its usual luxury boutique shops including some luxury car show room within the shopping centre like BMW and jaguar which is very unusual. It has a hugh departmental store within the shopping centre called Paragon and a big food court at the basement. If you are into end high shopping this is a place for you.

A famous landmark in Bangkok. It's a very famous shopping mall in Bangkok, and it's very convenient to get there because both of the BTS lines across there, the station is Siam Station. There is a very big supermarket and a food court in the base floor, and are many luxury brands in ground floor, also a department store and a cinema upstairs. It's a very comfortable shopping place.

A great and huge shopping mall. Siam Paragon is a great shopping mall maintained at the highest standard. Visited the Sealife Ocean world in the basement. Great View of sealife...an unforgettable experience. Though not good for budget shoppers but a great place to hang around.

Classy Shopping Mall. Siam Paragon is probably the most up-market shopping mall in Bangkok. It's located right next to the Siam BTS station and is very easy to access. There are a lot of interesting shops here, especially the Lamborghini shop. We bought a few mobile phones here and their prices were the same as anywhere else in Bangkok. This is one of my favourite shopping centres in Bangkok and worth visiting.

The Best shopping mall in Bangkok... Most of the well known brands are there. Ladies will like shopping there, nearly every thing is available. If you are accompanying you wife, and not interested in shopping, a very nice food court is there to compensate you. So shop around, or even do window shopping, or have a good meal. If you decide to visit one mall in Bangkok, this is the one. Enjoy.
Great place. Great place to go shopping and see many things that are on sale. Great restaurants and lovely people.

Shopping at its best. Deluxe high end shopping mall in the heart of beautiful Bangkok. Enjoy a day of shopping name brands, food to die for on the ground floor, magnificent Acquarium at lower level followed by a movie at one of the amazing movie theatres ... That is a whole day of excitement for the whole family ... Or single if you want. I have done this routine a dozen times already and will do again.

Favourite Hangout for Tourists. Siam Paragon has become a good place to hangout for most tourists for the follwing reasons:Proximity to BTS train stationProximity to many mid to high end hotel-chains Proximity to other shopping mallsModern and classy renovation, with Air conditioningHas its own local anchor tenant -a major departmental storePlenty of mid-end classy eateries that cost about USD 20-40 per paxGreat range of coffee and dessert places

Right place for shopping. Nice shopping mall, plenty of hi-end fashion brands from around the world and the various leading restaurants and authentic Thai food. So if you are ready for shopping this is the right place for you. But of course your pocket money will not be secure. Enjoy shopping!

Free Time Just Relaxing . I been in Bangkok I went to Saim Paragon many times I wanna showing my experience for people from aboard have to visiting for shopping it's has many things and a lot of restaurants
Best design mall. The best design for a mall i have ever seen. Happy I went there. Didn't really shop a lot beacuse it is expensive like home... but enjoyed every bit of it.
Just another shopping mall on a grand scale. If it is designer clothing you after, then this is the place to find it. There are no bargains to be had though, with prices sky high.

Great shopping, even for a non shopper. I'm not a big shopper, but it was very interesting to walk this shopping center looking at all the different stores. Seemed a bit expensive for me so did not buy, but still a nice way to take a walk and stay in the air conditioning.
Awesome shopping mall in Bangkok. The is the best and almost the biggest shopping centre in Bangkok. There are many shops and restaurants inside. The best place to visit when you are in Bangkok.

Siam Paragon. A great place for family with young kids to hang out with the Kidszania within the mall, wax museum and sealife.the food court has ample of great food. pricing can be a little higher but you can do all your shopping and dining within an air con environment
Normal shopping center. It is a big and trendy ahopping center full with luxurious brends. However... you can find those "shopping centers" everywhere in the world. Not special.

My favourite gourmet food market in Bangkok!. The mall its self is very nice, with all the up market retailers and also middle range like H &M and Zara. We love it for the food options downstairs. There is so much choice. It isnt cheap like street food, it would be standard pricing considering its in a mall. There is also a supermarket as well, so you can pick up fruits cheaper as well as small meals ect. its very handy to go and stock up or grab a bite.

Modern shopping center. It's so easy to access by sky train get off siam station especially your hotel on sukhumwit road as it's passed by sky train line. So many kind of restaurants like Thai, Japanese, Italian, etc. to choose. To shop things here can be more expensive than the other shopping centers I visited but it's worth visiting when you come to Bangkok.

World Class Shopping Mall in Bangkok. Siam Paragon is probably the best shopping mall in Thailand. This world class shopping mall sells Chanel, Gucci, Bulgari, and many more brands. The prices were expensive but it’s cheap to compare it with other shopping malls that sells the same brand, there are no fake brands that are selling in this mall. If you wish to visit Siam Paragon, you should also visit the aquarium in the first floor, its a great place for couples to visit. You should also try Lacerise’s macarons, they tasted really good and it’s not very expensive. If you wish, you could also go to the library called Kinokuniya, it's a massive sized library where you can buy english books, mangas, and chinese books. It also sells books in every category you can think of, art, history, design, and more!

Gourmet market. You can buy almost every thing in the gourmet market. I liked to buy fruit here, which was fresh and delicious.I also liked to eat mango with sticky rice, sold in a shop at the food court just opposite the cashier of the gourmet market.
Very nice mall. Very nice mall. High quality stuff and expensive. Well decorated. Nice food court. Has a European touch.

Luxury at its best!. Probably the best mall in the city of Bangkok, great food, shopping and full of glamour and attractions, It is all very high quality stuff here.The movie experience would be the best as, it is very advance technology and high quality experience stubbed with luxury. It looks larger then life. The open market food stall with grocery shopping again looks of very high quality,Not to forget the tea bar in the ground floor, along with several of dessert caffeteria.Over all one of the best mall i have ever been. It is also very well connected by road and Mrt train network. A stay away from here, change the line and you can board direct train to international airport.

Humongous high end shopping complex. This huge shopping center houses most of the luxury brands such as Chanel, Hermes, etc and sits in a very central area in Siam district. Direct access to BTS. Has an interesting aquarium complex on site.

I died and went to shopping heaven. Amazing shopping centre, maybe one of the best/biggest in South East Asia. Little bit of everything for everyone and includes a madame tussauds and a sealife centre alongside all your UK favourites including boots and costa! The mall is absolutely huge and it's a must see!

The best Shopping mall !!!!. This is the best shopping mall, it the mall contains over 250 shops . Siam Paragon is a shopping mall that was easy to visit. You can go by car, but I recommend you to use the BTS, because the BTS is not expensive it’s about 50 baht only. If you use the BTS you don’t need to find a place to park, because the BTS is in front of the Paragon. In Siam Paragon there are many interesting shops, for example they have almost every bag brand, perfume, fashion venue, Lifestyle and Leisure, I.T. World’ and more restaurants. At the Siam Paragon also have a VIP Cinema Experience and IMAX Theater too.The design of Siam Paragon is very beautiful, inside the Paragon there is a place that was very beautiful that we can take a picture. There are more things to experience in this shopping mall, so hope you come and visit this shopping mall.

The environment. The environment inside with many other people from around the world, a lot of different shops high end to mid ranges cafes, restaurants, biwlimg, movie theatre and kidzania for under 10 year old kids. It is a lovely place to hangout once a month as you have a lot of different options.

Awesome Mall . The best mall and the most crowded mall in Bangkok. It houses a huge food court with each and every food joint you can think of. Home to Madame Tussads and Sealife Marine world. A must visit when in Bangkok.
Gourmet market and Food Hall. apart from the department stores and brand names, if you're only see the food hall and gourmet market, it's worth the visit.

Amazing place to hang around . Shopping is very expensive but if you are rich, you have everything you could imagine over there.All the brands and all the shopping you want.The food court is huge and amazing and I think they have the best cinema complex in Bangkok.You must go to the sea world in the bottom floor, it's amazing even for grown ups and if you are with children they will love it.
Luxury Mall. General : International fashion and jewellery heaven.Tips : if you like luxury, branded things this place is for you.

Not to be missed. If you like world class -- worlds best -- shopping this is it . Many photo opportunities , always something new . Dynamic decorations . Especially wonderful at Christmas time . Always clean . If shopping is your passion this is where you should be .

High-end. Siam Paragon is essentially the high end shopping paradise. The same high end brands which you can find in other megacities like Singapore and Dubai. Do pay a visit to the Food Hall. You will enjoy the variety of authentic Thai cuisine. More expensive than the one at Terminal 21, though.

The center of shopping in Bangkok. Siam Paragon is amazing when it comes to shopping in Bangkok. I was not able to compare prices so I won't comment on that. The stores are placed conveniently by type on several floors. The store usually closes early at around 9:30 and many food outlets will run out of stuff earlier, so it is recommended to visit early.
Best retail therapy in Thailand. This is one of the best shopping malls in Thailand, all the great brands, fantastic food court all under one roof.Recommend for retail therapy and lunch.Awesome
the top rank shopping mall in BKK. I like this mall, it's convenience for me who travel by BTS. The staff quite polite and they offer me a decent service. A big variety of goods which I prefer.
Must visit in bangkok. Big clean and air conditioned mall Wil many brands.. You have to visit the mall's food court.. For sure you will find something for you..
visit the department store and the supermarket. very nice mall and good airconditioning. it also has a big bookstore and department store where you could find almost anything.

Posh mall with awesome eats. I love the supermarket at the basement. You can buy imported goods, traditional thai sweets and snacks and fresh fruit. Food I recommend are iberry (fruity ice cream), after you dessert cafe (ice cream toast), another hound (fusion thai food) and taling pling restaurant (traditional thai food). There are little stalls at the basement to buy yummy street snacks in a cleaner environment, but expect prices to be more expensive.Shopping here is generally for tourists/luxury goods so I stick to the department store and dining sections.

multi-function department store. The shopping mall is located in the midtown of Bangkok. Very convenience to access especially by sky train (BTS : Siam station) Many restaurants , shopping store , cinemas , fitness , book store , etc. So most people often go there. It often be a meeting point. Because there are many activities to do there.
The Vintage Shopping Place of Thailand. Every thing of brands are here. And Easy to connect with the transportation (BTS) to another place or back to our hotel.

Good Mall, Amazing Food Court. I'm not much of a shopper, so I didn't visit Paragon for that purpose. Instead, I can comment that movie theaters are very good (especially the very expensive Blue Ribbon), and that the food court is mind blowing. The food court has just about everything: Thai, Indian, Korean, Japanese, American, Mexican, and on and on. I was amazed and spend some nice time killing time there. Highly recommended for hungry shoppers.
Five star mall. This high quality mall , it's contain all brand name of the shop with siam paragon stor , I think who is looking for high quality brand he can visit this mall

You Want To Shop Where!. Siam Paragon, located opposite to Siam BTs which is very handy, but it is within walking distance of MBK, and Siam Square. A very large shopping complex even by Thai standards, and has all the normal high end designer shops and some med to low end. You just need to explore, it does have one of the best book shops for English titles a real find. While the shopping is good the food court and up market supermarket located on the ground floor is one of the best in Bangkok, even if a little expensive. However get in before the lunch time rush, take up a seat and it is a great people watching spot and you can have a bite to eat ranging from Asia to Western and even the Mexican is not too bad. Should it be raining and you have run out of adventures in Bangkok and feel the need to for some retail therapy this will tick the box for a few hours, over lunch is best.
Siam paragon Bangkok. Awesome....love this place really enjoyed there have grate time all branded shops and enjoyed in ocean world A lot
An amazing . Great shopping mall and all luxury brands you can find it here. Don't miss there cinema and go down to the food court enjoy Thai foods

Beautiful Shopping Mall, higher end merchandise and lots of restaurants!. Beautiful shopping center! Lots of high end stores, many levels of shopping, and in the bottom level there are all sorts of places to eat. They have frequent special events here. Very easy to get to! The BTS station SIAM is right here. It's air conditioned too! This mall is very big and can be very busy on the weekends.

Another shopping mall. I just go to Siam paragon to get lunch or dinner. Go to their food court or look around first floor you will get delicious food like street food outside. The price is reasonable.

It has everything.. Checked many of big shopping malls and department stores in Bangkok and still this is the place I would go unless trying to find thai young designer brands or do budget shopping in Platium fashion mall and BMK kinds.
All the big popular brands are here.
Some of restaurants are good and supermarket is huge.
good to vistis. it is a good place to spend one day of the weekend, specially when it's hot. it is very close to the other 2 malls, where you can find the acquarium and other activitites for children

Window shopping, great for variety of restaurants and convenience. Large mall that's good to walk around but expensive to buy given Hugh prices for foreign brands. Food court, restaurant and grocery shopping is good to do!

First thing we do in Bangkok!. Every time we are in Bangkok, we go first to Siam Paragon (by Sky Train). There are many things to do. Shopping, aquarium, thousand restaurants and the best food store in Thailand.
The quality is high!
One of the best shopping centers of Bangkok.
We come back soon!
Aom and Fred
Phuket

A thing of Beauty. This is a shopping mall that is very upscaled. Even if you can't afford to but, just looking around is a treat. They also have a movie theatre, restaurants, and many things of beauty. The skytrain stops there

Bangkok Luxury At It's Best. This mall is a must visit. From the cinemas to the luxury car dealerships to the insanely large supermarket there is something for everyone. It took us close to a day to get around, but was worth it if you have time to kill and wish to escape the heat. The shopping is also pretty good, the H&M was really worth it. Similarly it was easy to get to and from this mall via taxis and public transport.
Posh shopping junction . All the biggest brands of world are present here. Not the place for bargain. Even you can find the most expensive cars also here. Near Siam BTS station, so easy to access.
siam paragon. Big mall in central Bangkok, as an entertainment center. Comfortable and modern, and also a center of youth.

Place which pressed all of entire Bangkok city. Huge.. You can't even look around in half of day but supermarket is the best. They are gonna take safe taxi for you. This is nice service to visitors indeed.
Good Location. Good location for shopping and resturant. Siam Paragon has a lot of shop.I like the ZARA shop, H&M shop.
big mall. Super big mall with a lot of international brands. My favorite things at this mall is the food court. there are many selections and great food :)

Luxury mall. That is a place for the shopaholic and the people in need of a stroll
One can find anything from a phone outlet to a branded shop such as Cartier, Vuitton, Rolls Royce , Maserati...you name it
A few restaurants and coffee shops along with a food centre and a great supermarket
High End Shopping. High end shopping options with great movie theater and Kidzania. Great dining options as well. There's a lot to see here.
One of the best mall in Asia. Paragon is one of the best mall in Asia including lot of multi label fashion and luxury brand store.
very very nice. all is grate in siam paragon, for shopping and food have much choice, ..... perfect for kids have anything you want designer stores to the movies aquarium fish .... we will be back

Worth the visit!. Definitely worth a visit, even if its just to check out the ground floor comprising of the food court. Of note the Gourmet Supermarket. We enjoyed browsing here more than the retail shops! Absolutely amazing. Wish we had more time here!
Best Place For Luxury Goods. If you don't have a budget and have expensive taste you'll love this place. There's a wide variety of extremely high end goods.

Excellent shopping and food court. Don't be ashamed to escape the heat (or rain) and soak in some air conditioning in a mall. Amazing food court and other restaurants where you can find anything from traditional Thai to Western foods. The mall has great shopping if you are looking for more designer or name brand items.
Popular shopping. Lots of restaurants. Popular place for tourist and local. Close to bts sky train. Center of Bangkok. Many Luxury shop. Nice place to take a photo. Recommend for you to visit here.

All In One High End Shopping. Paragon is like a small city with high end shopping, a multi-floor department store, electronics and cell phone shops everywhere. It is well organized and has a fine selection of restaurants and a food court on the lower level for low cost dining. There is also a large conference and exhibition facility as well as a multi-plex cinema with the latest releases. If you are looking for one place to go to meet your shopping and entertainment needs the Paragon is one of the best. It is at the Siam interchange of the BTS system and easy to reach.

Great heat relief. I really like Siam Paragon, especially on a hot day when you need air con! A lot of the stores are luxury, so they are not super affordable, but the department store and a few other shops are decent. Best part is the food area downstairs - from the food court to restaurants to sweet shops, all of the food is yummy and beyond satisfactory.

Beautiful mall at the city center. It is right at Bangkok's center, Siam. The place is beautiful with high-end shops inside as well as a cinema. It is right next to Siam station of the BTS train system.

Such variety of shops and food. Visited many times whilst on recent vacation.bewildering amount of resteraunts. From basic to high end outlets. Something for everyone and for the adventures amongst us. The Korean food was excellent as was the Thai All the fast foods are also represented My favourite was the Japanese curry restaurant . So nights you had to wait to be seated. It was so popular. Upstairs the multitude of cosmetic outlets were all manned and I use that word loosely . With happy smiling and most helpfull and patient smiling ladies gentlemen and ladybugs.out side the taxi ranks are organised and Marshalled by security staff. So no rip offs thie.all in all a great mall to visit.
Nice Mall. Has everything to spend the day. Ocean world and madam tussads are located at this mall.With the number of shops and brand stores there is a bit for everyone.

Wow what a shopping Centre!. Siam Parragon is a a shoppers paradise, lots of designer shops and a huge food court. There were even car showrooms within the centre, (Aston Martin, Lamborghini, Maserati, Rolls Royce, Bentley, Audi, BMW and mini!) certainly makes the men happy whilst shopping! I am still trying to work out how they get the cars in there! It was a great way to spend a few hours, could've spent a day there!
One stop shopping conveniently next to Siam Station. A rather high end mall with brand names such as LV, Hermes... I like the food court most with a good range of food of different nationalities.
SIAM. Good options for dining, shopping and entertainment, nearby BTS and many hotels, also near to Pratunam

Love this place!. Lot of fun was happen here all the time while I enjoyed my vacay in Bangkok. Many tourist and overcrowed every period of the day and I love to walk around to try new food and drink which I never had before, it's awesome! There is a garret popcorn and krispy creme shop here as well in case you are looking it :)
Thailand Mall. Good and big mall. Most of the sales speak broken English, but that is enough for you to do some shopping. You can negotiate / bargain in some shop.

Everything and some more. It is a luxury shopoing mal. Bring good shoes cause here you can walk for hours. Also bring some money if you want to buy things here, beacuse here it is all about brands. Mostly the expencive ones. The mall has a great food store and restaurant area.
great place. this was a great shopping experience, there is also ocean world there which is worth a visit too. there are sooo many shops one can go crazy shopping

Not for the deep pockets but great place to enjoy the luxury. If shopping here is your aim, make sure you are extremely loaded. Nothing is cheap here. Is a place for people with more money than sense. However, is an ace place to be and for doing some window shopping. Enjoy the luxury and the ambiance. Dress decent or some look down on you. If you need a Rolls or a Mesarati, can buy it here. Top floor has state of the art Cineplex while ground and basement is where largely the 'action' is.

A bit of everything. The main reasons I usually go there for;1. The restaurants at level 1, wide selection and great for a fall-back if I can't think of anything good around the area. Good selection of street food in a clean setting.2. Kinokuniya books, for english books and magazines3. Paragon department store for some quirky stationeryThat's about it. Everything else is just fluff.

Nicest Mall In Bangkok. All the designer stores are here, along with high end car dealers, a Gourmet Market, every kind of food imaginable, the best movie theaters, an aquarium, and even Madame Tussaud's wax museum!

Luxury shopping mall. Siam Paragon is one of Bangkok's most luxurious shopping mall. It has mostly branded shops in the mall. The mall's ambience is good and you definitely have to visit the mall's cinema after you feel tired walking as the cinema is very cozy.

Don't bother. Was so excited for shopping in Bangkok, however although the mall is gorgeous and they have a large range of shops, everything is so much more money than it would be in the UK. Absolutely extortionate. Also don't come here in your beach clothes, eveyone looks at you like you are a piece of trash.
Great Cinema at Siam . Shopping with a lot more standard then MBK but expensive... You can get the most products cheaper even in Sweden! But Nice cafe's and a great Cinema!

The CentralWorld is better in any term. Was rated as one of the best shopping malls in BankgogI'm not saying it's bad, but I'm sure saying it ain't one of the bestIt was too crowdedHard to get around the place as the navigation is not intuitive, starting with the escalators not properly arranged making you walk a mile in order to head down a couple of floors. Not much of trendy brands (as in Central World), but rather more of department stores.The food court however is great and has a lot to offerIf you've got time to get to only a single shopping mall, go to Central world (half a mile away from here)If you're here for shopping and got to tick all checkboxes, you can come over here as wellElse, it can be skipped

Wow what a mall.. You can probably tell by the title of this review that I love to shop.An shopping here is always a pleasure. Being from the US. I get to see a few styles that we a lacking in the US. I also purchased an extra luggage to carry all the extra goodies I found an I.looove that bag made by tumi Reeeally well made if you don't have a tumi treat yourself. They are expensive but worth it.

Nice mall. I have to come here every weekend for over five years and nothing changed much. Everything is so expensive in here. The only good thing about it is I can walk around with the air conditioning and get to use the free bathroom.

Good location, good shopping, good eats (if you have the baht). Good place to buy and eat. A bit on the expensive side compared to other malls. Sells many premium brands and products.
Location is just beside Siam BTS Station. Very convenient.
Shoopppppp. An awesome place to shop... All International brands at one place... Direct access to the complex via the Siam skytrain station.

Good Shopping Mall in Bangkok. Siam Paragon is one of the best shopping mall in Thailand. Located at the heart of shopping center in Bangkok. The land value reached highest since Siam Paragon openned. This shopping mall fulfill with many flagship stores and also local stores plus best Movie Cinemas as IMAX, 4D Theatre, Digital Theatres and also the big hall for concert. Additional, Siam Ocean World. If you visit Bangkok, recommend to go to Siam Paragon.

Biggest Shopping Mall in Bangkok !!!. This is so far the Biggest Shopping Mall, I have visited. Plenty of space for parking in basement, saw some really cool cars parked.Plenty of options including international brands to shop, hence bit expensive.Food options are also plenty.MUST VISIT PLACE IF YOU ARE IN BANGKOK

Best supermarket!!. My kids and I always go to Paragon supermarket to buy some raw material for our meals. They provide very good quality of fruits, vegetables and meats. And you can find any ingredients around the world here so many selections. Of course the price is high comparing with other places but you will get the good quality as well.
New place. Nice shoppingmall. Expensive though. We went for the food court, the food there was very good with a great choice of different dishes.

One of Great Shopping Place in Town. Enjoy your time with shopping spree within the building. You can find everything that you want in the department store & plaza area, e.g. household products, books, gadgets, cloths, cosmetics, etc. Tons of food shops, restaurants, desserts, cafe and also cinemas.
lot of options. what you want you can have it all. there is underwater world. food court is also there. you can spend almost a day there.

Biggest Mall in Bangkok. Nice for strolling. A wide array of branded clothings, shoes and restaurants. There is also a movie theater inside the mall. Accessible to any mode of transpo since location is aling Sukhumvit Road.
Great place for shopping. Great place for shopping, i like their decoration for window show, New style for fashion and many good branch in the world. i found my favorite shop here :)

Best food market/super market. Every time we come to Bangkok we stop at the food market it is not only a super market but you can also buy food already cooked and eat it in the super market at small bar areas.
They also have a great array of nibbles to take back to your hotel.
Food Court !!!!. Many choices for the foods & beverages at the ground floor. Mostly delicious. And 2nd Floor most of the guys will love it, fancy cars & stuffs.......

Siam Paragon. A multi story shopping complex to make the ladies salivate. There is also an underwater world, and on one floor a host of car dealers showing of all manner of very expensive and desirable cars. Think Ferrari, Lamborghini, Porsche, BMW, Masserati, Rolls Royce, Bentley etc etc (have I got your attention now boys ??). An excellent spot to do a bit of wishful browsing while the ladies do their thing. Also has some good food spots.

Great Mall. Big mall. Nice design. Clean. Plenty of options in the food court. They have exhibits from time to time in the main hall. Siam is an interchange in the Skytrain so expect a lot of people especially during rush hour.

Swank sprawling shopping complex in downtown Bangkok. This is an impressive upscale mall, with a large Aquarium as its attraction. On the retail side, the layout is less efficient, and can be a little confusing. The good array of food outlets in both the basement and the upper level is the biggest drawcardLocated next to skytrain

Mall of the wonder.. This mall is designed for the classy people in Bangkok. You will find even the luxurious car dealers such like Rolls-Royce, Bentley, Bugatti, Maserati and more. All of the mall is perfect. Even if you visit the aquarium on the basement of the mall you are going to see the wonder of the sea creatures. The food court is clean and delicious.

Good food & shopping. The ground floor is filled with all kinds of food both local and international. Of course, food court is there too. Other floors have plenty of brand name shops. The decoration is modern and luxury.
Beautiful. Lovely shopping centre, very expensive but nice to look around. Reasonably priced resturants to eat at. Nice and clean , good security.

Nice Eats,Nice Shops, Best Grocery. The food mall ( basement area) is thriving with hungry locals and tourists partaking of the gustatory delights that it can offer: Chinese food side by side with Vietnamese and Japanese kiosks. And many, many more but somehow my taste leaned on the hot ( super hot) favourite Tom Yang with four pieces of prawn for only 70 baht! We also tried the red juice ( too sweet) and the new discovery Pandan juice ( preferred taste). We went to the nearby grocery filled to the brim with fresh cherries, apples, pears, mangoes, oranges, etc. and bought apples, soda, milk, strawberry jam and bread for a quick fix in the middle of the night. How we wish we have a kitchen in our hotel so we can fix salads and sandwiches for breakfast. For commodity shopping, we went the next day and was surprised on the creative way of decorating their stores using indigenous material and materials unthought of before like deformed bars!

Shopping fashion mall. Siam Paragon is the best place for me and my family, friends for shopping here. So I would like to recommend all of you try to shopping here to sharing experience compare with another place you were shopping before. Moreover I were happy to shopping here again and again while I am in Bangkok, Thailand.

First Class Mall. One of the most beautiful malls I've ever seen.
I love the mini cooper family in the ground floor when I was there.

Good Shopping Good Food Great Cinema. This place is next to BTS Siam Square station. You can walk out of the station right into paragon. So it is convenient to reach.In the basement in ocean world great place if you don't scuba dive. Above that are the food courts and fancy restaurants. Nothing special in the food court, but the special events nearby have specialty foods from all over. Normally there will be something worthy to try. It changes every 12 days. Then above that is shopping and more shopping. At the extreme end there is a jewelry shop with an foreign currency exchange facility, it has always offered the best rates in Thailand. I think it is on the 3rd floor.Then on top are the cinemas with imax.Generally worth a visit.

A must-go shopping mall. My favorite shopping mall with probably the best supermarket! Cannot leave BKK without visiting this place! The food court has so many different choices from local snacks to noodle soup. There is no way to leave this place with an empty stomach!

Very expensive and fancy mall. Paragon is only one of the four Malls at this street corner and all of them have nearly the same shops, products and price-level. What separates them are the customers and food courts as well as the size of the stores. Paragon has fancy high so clients from Thailand and abroad but also tons of tourists and on some days its just a hassle to try and shop there. For pretty much the same Thai customers and much less foreigners, go to Emporium which is a few stops down the Sukhumvit BTS. A great place to be looking for a sugar mama or daddy. The food court however is amazing and also the supermarket is awesome.Ah by the way, they also have an amazing cinema, 4D cinema upstairs (but also very expensive, you get the same size and quality cinema in lower priced malls) and also a huge seaworld downstairs.

Must Visit and never boring. If you skip out Siam Paragon, then you have missed something, don't visit any other shopping mall or if you just want to visit one particular place this would suffice as there are other attractions near to places like Siam Centre/Siam Discovery shopping malls and Siam Ocean World (Underwater world).Yes, it a high end mall but then that doesn't mean you cannot visit it, you can do shopping somewhere else and then there is food court and everything that a shopping mall has to offer, in fact more than that.

Expensive expensive expensive. The Terminal 21 is much nicer. Yes, you can find all kinds of expensive products, from Lamborghini to Chanel, but the building itself is cold, boring, full of rich people walking around wasting their money.

My Favourite food court in the World. This is a highish end mall although unlike Gaysorn or Central Embassy which are stunning malls with very high end retailers; Siam Paragon actually has shoppers!Siam Paragon flows into Siam Centre and it flows into the now closed for renovation Siam Discovery which is opposite the famous MBK Centre wehich is more like an internal market than a shopping Centre in the Siam mould.Siam Paragon has the best food court I have seen and it is a sprawling and tasty array of different and varied retailers buzzing all the time in this popular basement with brilliant access from the street, shopping centre and importantly from the BTS skytrain.The newly opened Emquartier will challenge this on a higher end level yet the accessibility to all people that Siam has will endure.
Easily accessed Modern Mall. You can reach this mall right at Siam BTS station without going outdoor. Lots of shops to browse and shop if budget aren't a thing for you.

Bangkoks Finest!. Bangkok's most exclusive and premier shopping destination. Although the mall mainly showcases well known and expensive designer brands, there are still plenty of deals on offer for the wise shopper from the mid level brands like Uniqlo, Zara, Boots, Kinokuniya. But for most the ultimate "window shopping experience"-whether looking at the most luxurious bags or Swiss watches or perfumes or even the fanciest cars. Brilliant setting, excellent to hang out and for those who love to photograph themselves. Connected with Siam Square, Central World. Fantastic supermarket on the ground floor, and well priced food court serving a variety of cuisines. Sealife Bangkok is on the bottom floor. So the day you visit this, you can keep hanging out in Siam Paragon on your agenda.

No fakes and real sharks. This is one of SE Asia's premier shopping malls and sits along a strip of many luxury malls. Siam Paragon is a unique destination and even includes an aquarium which has real SCUBA with sharks diving on offer. My 15 year old son did it and it was an amazing experience. Make sure you are a licensed diver to part take in this activity as otherwise you'll be allowed only to walk along the bottom with an airtube.Shopping leaves nothing to be desired, anything from H&M jeans to Rolls Royce autos are on offer here.

Beautiful mall...very expensive. If you're looking for all the high end flag shop stores and aren't sticking to a budget, this is the place to go. You won't find any sales or budget items here. It's the most upscale mall I've ever been in but I also didn't buy anything. Nice to see but if you're the average person, don't come here expecting to shop.
Shopping. Very good Mall, large with good variety of shops. Good quality shopping, nice food court with plenty of choice at good price.

Expensive. Great to escape the heat, good opportunity to see how the other half lives - I have never been in a mall where you can buy a Rolls or a Masserati. There are also more 'luxury brand' shops in one place than i have ever seen - in fact some of them I have heard of but never seen a shop. Upshot is it makes this mall clean, bright, glitzy and really expensive. The aquarium is worth a visit though.

Go to window shop and people watch. 5th Avenue in one building. Luxury cars on every floor. High end dining to Krispy Creme. Fantastic book store. Clean bathrooms. Easy to get to because it is on the train line. It is neighbor to all other shopping centers.

Great place to get out of the heat. Every shop you could ever want to visit - whether or not you could afford to buy anything is another question. A great place to get out of the heat and grab something to eat.

Shop,til,you drop. This is a brand name store, for the well healed, and not for the average joe from the streets, first floor for foodies the rest is wall to wall opulence and extravagance. That's not a bad thing if you have the means. But the joy can be found just from wandering around it with your head on a swivel.

"Super wonderful Mall". Great place for shopping, movies, afternoon enjoying a tea or coffee at one of the so many place to step in...every months new promotions and weekly events.As well great location for BTS and splendid connection to the Siam Center...

This mall renews itself yearly . It is a must to visit this mall and spend at least half a day here if you visit bangkok. This mall is as good as any top malls in Canada with things costing only about 50% - 70% of those in Canada. You can find all kinds of food, clothings....., you name it, here.
Nice shopping place. Its a grand shopping centre that can spend ur whole day time n ur money as well ;pThe 3d copy, 1 : 100 is very interesting, if u have budget, dun miss it

World of fashion. A great place to have shopping. You can find many shops from all over the world brought in one mall, moreover you can find for all ages. But i have a small disadvantage! It closes at 10 pm hope so the closing time changes as bangkok is the city of tourist

Luxury overflowing. As far as luxurious shopping goes, this mall does not disappoint. How about checking out Rolls Royce cars on second floor?
The price tags are a bit high for the average tourist though, but it can be entertaining just to browse all these incredibly expensive brand goods.

Pacific cigar at Siam Paragon is a must for cigar aficionados. To find the cigar shop you need to go inside the wine shop located at the ground floor then take a stair up
They had the cuban cigars I smoke
Partagas D4, Montecristo Petit Edmundo, Romeo Wide churchill and Hoyo small robusto
Quality is premium, prices are high (duties!....)
this is a place I highly recommend to fellow cigar smokers

Exclusive expensive. If you want to buy luxury fashion you have to go to siam paragon, beautiful architecture and easy to reach . Blv, LV, miumiu, guess, prada, and so on, you can find it in siam
Just take bts and stop at bts siam walk 5 minutes and taadaaa your here
Super mall. A beautiful structure and interior with impressive shop displays. Lots of choices and easy to get to using the BTS skytrain. Definitely worth a visit for top brands and a bit of luxury.
Huge . One of the expense Mall. Most brand outlets but few are out of complete range food court is good multiple activistes and attractions for kids including Cinema's.

Huge modern mall adjoining BTS Station. Siam Paragon is everything you would expect a modern mall to be. It carries the staple brands and offers plenty of culinary and dessert choices.
It's central location and easy access via Siam BTS Station makes it a sure-fire destination on any traveler's Bangkok itinerary.

Strongly recommended even if you're not into shopping. ... Do come in during the day, and especially at night time. Even you could careless to shop or Gabe budgeted little to shop, or run out of space of your luggage to put new items. The Siam Paragon had among the greatest Food Hall in the world. You can live here for months and won't cover all the restaurants here. I'm not exaggerating. The food is delicious and the cost is not life threatening either ;-)There are many more things you can enjoy there. For me, the IMAX theater, and the luxurious automobile showrooms. Oh well, whether you care for them as much or not, do explore this place from top floor down for yourself. Hope you'll find it (and surrounding attractions) worthwhile one or two visits. One last thing, forget about the taxis, though they are cheapest in Bangkok, take the Skytrain. It drops you off the entrance.

International Shopping Center. If you are a shopaholic, you will love Paragon. Just about every high end international shop is here. Very clean and safe. Particularly like the extensive food court in the basement. Not really Thai, but the feature shopping Center in central Bangkok.

Brands. U will get all brands here3 malls all together concept applys in siam paragon...U will have shopping of any brand as well as madam tussad and under ocean world also u can see here.... with 12D movieGreat exp.
A shopping centre. One of many shopping centres in Bangkok but I couldn't find any special character there. I would suggest to add new and market-demanded element to attract returned customers.

Wow!. The visit to the Paragon was to do some grocery shopping. Headed to the basement level and was stunned by the selection of food. Great international supplies! Stocked up on French cheese and wine and some fruit. I can't wait return and take my time taking in the sights. 2 hours free parking if you have the luxury of a vehicle.

THE top-end shopping mall. In a crowded city, space is where you show luxury...wide aisles and high ceilings..where you don't rub shoulder-to-shoulder as you wander past the World's top brand-names, and a few more besides. Not my scene, but if it is your's this really is the place to visit in BKK.

Giant Upscale Shopping Mall. This place is a favorite of most visitors to Bangkok, and a must see for diehard shoppers.Lots of great food on a couple of floors, especially the main floor. The is a very large high end grocery store on the main floor. Go look around at all the exotic foods for sale, and some to order up and eat there.Most, if not all, of the major high end brands are on sale here.It is a huge place consisting of many floors.If you are not into shopping, then this is not a place for you.

Best mall in bangkok. Siam paragon is must visit place if you in bangkok. So many delicious food make me always want to come here if visiting bangkok. Siam paragon always the best. Great location also

Bankoks best mall . Siam Paragon is truly the best mall in the city. It has just all in it. From designer shops to a fantastic department store. I like it's restaurants on the 5th. Floor. It's my regular cinema venue. I can just recommend it.

All the expensive brands, not so impressive. After reading some of the reviews I thought Siam Paragon would be really impressive. For me it wasn't. Only expensive brands, so on a budget you can not buy anything here. I did not think the mall itself was impressive. Yes there are expensive cars and clothes, but they are not displayed that nice that I would go there again to watch it. I liked the MBK a lot more than Siam Paragon. For me Siam Paragon was not worth the visit. The Krispy Kream doughnut shop was nice!
glittery. one place that beats this in the overall picturesqueness is dubai mall. love place to just take walk at.

Nice entertainment and shopping. There a are a lot of options for entertainment and shopping. Amazing food court with a lot of options for fast food or more sophisticated places. We had lunch at Fiji (Japanese food) and two times in Amici Pomodoro (very good Italian food). It´s very easy to reach the mall by BTS (Siam station).
Heaven. I been to Bangkok more than like 10 times and I never get bored of the shopping mall "Siam" place its like in the city centre.

Shop till you drip. One of the best shopping malls in Bangkok with one of the best cinemas and activities. This mall has all what you need , things to see to all the designer labels you would want .. Madam Tassauds , Sea life , Cinema complex with iMax and 4dx cinema screens .. Huge food hall .. With variety of food , from Indian to fast food. One of the best malls in town .

Luxury at its best!. Siam Paragon is a luxury mall with a vivid variety of brands. Great for shopping (VAT refund for tourist, YAY!) and eating (soooooo many options- double YAY!)
It is huge and we got awfully tired after the excursion- but totally worth it-for shoppers!
It also has Ladurée macarons; which we tried and loved :)

Excellent shopping mall. A huge modern shopping mall with everything you need. From a Rolls Roy car to a doghnut. Exept from the great shopping there are also one hundred restaurant and coffee shops. And foodcourt, grocery store, a huge cinema and so on....

Bangkok's one stop shop :). Siam Paragon is one of my favorite mall in Bangkok. The other is Central World. :)Why?- Great location –just next to Siam BTS station- Huge shopping mall with many shops of all kind. Good variety for everyone. You definitely need more than 3 hours here :)- Big and spacious. Love the clean and classy look as well. Makes shopping comfortable, although branded goods in Bangkok is more expensive vs Hong Kong, Singapore and Kuala Lumpur.- I love the restaurants and food choices here. So many to choose from. I recommend Kalpapruek Restaurant for delicious Thai food. Love the roti with chicken/pork curry, roti with fried chicken, fried rice with yellow curry pork and tom kha kai. Also visit Laem Cha-Roen Seafood! High recommended. Delicious food and reasonably price. - Dessert place is ample – so many selection from Western to local. Try Coffee Bean by Dao for delicious cakes!- Kinokuniya book shop – one of the biggest book shop that I have ever been to. Books are slightly cheaper here and they offer free wrapping service :)- Entertainment – big cinema and bowling alley if you are interested. They even have an aquarium and wax museum :)Be prepared to spend a day here. Recommended to visit this mall on weekdays as weekends can be crowded.If you think this review is useful, please click on the helpful button. :) Thank you. Kop kun krub!

Huge and luxury mall!. Almost every tourist will come to see this mall. That's why it is always full of people here. The mall this huggeee, countless shops, brand with a really high price. They also have some sales off section but not so much. I specially impressed with the cinema on the 5th floor.
Best food court. Fantastic shopping centre with all the usual brands from around the world but with upmarket thai handicrafts. Don't miss the food hall, great choice of asian cuisine.
Excellent Mall. Mall has everything you and your family needs. From basic shopping to entertainment and cinemas. You can easily spend the whole day here and come back for more.

Massive modern mall. Massive shopping centre with 8 floors.Delivers what you need, from the huge restaurant area on the ground floor to the gigantic IMAX cinema on the 8th, with everything else in between.

Nice big mall. If you need a big departmental store for a good shopping experience, Siam Paragon is the place to go. A good mix of international and local eclectic brands will keep you busy browsing. There is a big food court at the basement and a wide array of upmarket cafes/restaurants on the Canal level too. Bought a gift for a friend's child and gift wrap service is good.

Luxury Mall. The mall is accessible especially by train. Siam station is right beside the mall. Many high end brands are available in Siam Paragon. The mall looks even more beautiful at night with many lights on. There's a big screen that shows a lot of advertisement, similar to the screens in NY and Tokyo.

Outstanding . If you never saw at the third floor of a mall a Rolls Royce or a Lamborghini show room you should go to Siam Paragorn ! Even more at the basement you have a huge aquarium with sharks and so many fishes species.The shopping part it self is just top class

Impressive Mall with Luxury Brands. Siam Paragon has mostly luxury brands to offer, so if you're looking splurge on your trip, you should definitely visit it.
The mall has good infrastructure and some amazing light decorations right outside the mall.
Nice large shopping mall. Nice large shopping mall, has a lot of food outlets and coffee shops. Shopping mall has prayer room for Muslims.

Impressive high $ mall.. Very impressive and shiny mall in the heart of the "New" Bangkok City Center. Great if you need anything from a new screaming red Ferrari or jet black Rolls Royce to endless high end designer cloths and cosmetics. Appears that all items here are authentic and you will pay dearly for them but still a great way to kill many hours in a very nice environment.
